ABOUT.TITLE: What is Startup Weekend?
ABOUT.DETAIL: Startup Weekend is one of the largest and most recognized programs for entrepreneurs worldwide, where in 54 hours people of all profiles meet to turn their ideas into real innovative businesses.

MAP_CONTENT.LOCATION_DESCRIPTION: Startup Weekend Cochabamba 2018 will take place at Campo Ferial of the Alalay lagoon.

FACILITATOR.TITLE: Facilitator
FACILITATOR.NAME: Gonzalo Mena F.
FACILITATOR.JOB: Manager at Elkare Consultora and Duoc UC professor of Entrepreneurship and Innovation
FACILITATOR.SPECIALTY: Specialized in facilitating the access of local and foreign entrepreneurs to the Chilean ecosystem, training them and connecting them with companies to generate business.
FACILITATOR.DESCRIPTION: He studied Business Administration and has two Diplomas in Business and Technology, and Corporate Entrepreneurship. He has been an entrepreneur for 10 years in different areas (Law, Tourism, Design, among others). Fan of Collaboration and Entrepreneurship as tools of social equalization and destroyers of old paradigms. He has dedicated himself to empowering, connecting and empowering entrepreneurs on their way to success.

QR_CODE.DESCRIPTION: * Use this QR code to access the benefits in the Startup Weekend 2018.
